name: Return the SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format an Account with no SEPA Direct Debits

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format on the following Account:
| nsc | account |
| 932361 | 27102083 |

children.description: Get UBS sepa direct debits transactions: aib.oneview.ui.model.account.SepaDirectDebitUBSListRequest@4e5fd09e

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format should be returned
| debtor_Acc | originatorName | creditor_ID_OIN | agreement_ID_UMR | status | amount | settlement_date |

children.description: Validate sepa UBS direct debits response: | debtor_Acc | originatorName | creditor_ID_OIN | agreement_ID_UMR | status | amount | settlement_date |

userStory.storyName: View Direct Debits - In UBS Style

title: Return the SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format an Account with no SEPA Direct Debits
